name: Astrack
description:
Welcome Commander!

Your objective is to keep planet protected (alive) from incoming asteroids!

Left click on the target to initiate missile launch!

Remember, keep the planet alive!

"Astrack" was made during Ludum Dare 46.

note: running the game requires decent computer. because of limited time frame, game is poorly optimized. In addition, game is build using unity HD render pipeline, making it harder to run on some devices.
